SELECT di.*, ei.`name` AS enterpriseName, ei.`code` AS enterpriseCode, ei.images FROM difficulties_info di LEFT JOIN t_user tu ON tu.USER_ID = di.user_id LEFT JOIN enterprise_info ei ON ei.CODE = tu.user_code WHERE 1 = 1
AND di.name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{difficultiesInfo.name},'%')
AND di.type LIKE CONCAT('%',#{difficultiesInfo.type},'%')
AND di.user_id= #{difficultiesInfo.userId}
order by di.create_date desc
